title: Ticket #2622: RFE: COLLECTOR_USES_SHARED_PORT configuration
description:
Motivation is simplifying configuration for putting all daemons behind shared-port, including the collector.

Enabling shared-port for everything except the collector is a simple USE_SHARED_PORT=TRUE and DAEMON_LIST=$(DAEMON_LIST),SHARED_PORT.

Enabling SHARED_PORT for the collector requires COLLECTOR_ARGS=-sock collector and SHARED_PORT_ARGS=-p 3131 (to provide a known port), and COLLECTOR_HOST update to include :3131?sock=collector on all nodes. Additionally, in an HA Collector setup, all collectors in COLLECTOR_HOST must be attributed.

COLLECTOR_USES_SHARED_PORT = TRUE could default SHARED_PORT_ARGS = -p 9618, COLLECTOR_ARGS = -sock collector and ?sock=collector for each collector in COLLECTOR_HOST.
